TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsTokenRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 從 Windows 群組成員資格取得 ASP.NET 應用程式的角色資訊。

span.span: Gets role information for an ASP.NET application from Windows group membership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是擷取角色資訊的 Windows 安全性群組為基礎的 Windows 使用者的唯讀角色成員資格提供者。The class is a read-only role-membership provider that retrieves role information for a Windows user based on Windows security groups. 它是最適合用於使用 Windows 驗證模式的 IIS 驗證設定停用匿名驗證的 ASP.NET 應用程式。It is most useful with ASP.NET applications that use Windows authentication mode where the IIS authentication settings disable anonymous authentication. 您可以設定以允許或拒絕存取以特定的 Windows 群組中使用者的成員資格的 ASP.NET 應用程式。You can configure ASP.NET applications to allow or deny access based on a user's membership in a particular Windows group. 您無法使用類別用來建立或刪除角色，或修改根據 Windows 群組成員資格之角色的成員資格。You cannot use the class to create or delete roles or modify the membership of a role that is based on Windows group membership. 這項功能是由 Windows 作業系統管理。This functionality is managed by the Windows operating system. 類別只支援和方法抽象類別。The class supports only the and methods of the abstract class. ## Examples 下列範例 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案。The following example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用 Windows 驗證和類別來擷取 Windows 使用者的角色資訊。It specifies that the application uses both Windows authentication and the class to retrieve role information for Windows users. 元素會指定只有 BUILTIN\Administrators 群組的使用者，才允許存取應用程式。The element specifies that only users in the BUILTIN\Administrators group are allowed access to the application. ``` ```

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式由 ASP.NET 呼叫來建立的執行個體類別做為應用程式的組態中指定。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ApplicationName { get; set; }
.property instance string ApplicationName
Public Overrides Property ApplicationName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於其他的角色提供者，例如、類別不將角色資訊關聯的應用程式。Unlike other role providers such as the , the class does not associate role information with an application. 相反地，角色資訊是來自本機電腦上的 Windows 群組。Instead, the role information is taken from the Windows groups on the local computer. 使用相同的伺服器上多個應用程式類別都會共用相同的角色資訊。Multiple applications on the same server that use the class always share the same role information. 雖然`applicationName`可以設定應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中屬性不用來擷取角色資訊。Although the `applicationName` can be configured in the Web.config file for the application, the property is not used to retrieve role information. ## Examples 下列範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體和設定屬性`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

summary.span: 取得使用者所屬的 Windows 群組清單。

span.span: Gets a list of the Windows groups that a user is in.

returns.span: 字串陣列，包含指定使用者所屬的所有 Windows 群組名稱。

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the Windows groups that the specified user is in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別來擷取 Windows 作業系統的 Windows 群組，指定的使用者所屬的清單。This method is called by the class to retrieve from the Windows operating system a list of the Windows groups that the specified user is in. LOGON_USER 伺服器變數所識別，可以只針對目前登入的使用者，呼叫方法。The method can be called only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 如果有提供值`username`參數不是目前登入的使用者名稱，就會擲回。If the value supplied in the `username` parameter is not the name of the currently logged-on user, a is thrown. 如需詳細資訊的 ASP.NET 和 Windows 驗證，請參閱[ASP.NET 驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。For more information an ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來擷取指定的使用者角色的清單，並繫結至角色的清單控制項。The following code example uses the method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds the list of roles to a control. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/CS/viewrolescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/VB/viewrolesvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the specified user is in the specified Windows role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您檢查使用者是否為其中一種所描述的一般 Windows 角色列舉型別。The method enables you to check whether a user is in one of the common Windows roles described by the enumeration. 這個方法是適用於已當地語系化為多種語言的應用程式。This method is useful for applications that are localized into multiple languages. 這個多載方法不是屬於基底類別，並只能透過將轉型存取屬性類別做為型別。This overload of the method is not part of the base class and can only be accessed by casting the property of the class as the type. 您可以呼叫只針對目前登入的使用者，以識別 LOGON_USER 伺服器變數的方法。You can call the method only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 如果有提供值`username`參數不是目前登入的使用者名稱，就會擲回。If the value supplied in the `username` parameter is not the name of the currently logged-on user, an is thrown. 方法只可以呼叫由 LOGON_USER 伺服器變數的目前登入的使用者。 method can only be called for the currently logged-on user identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 目前登入的使用者必須是 Windows 驗證的使用者。The current logged on user must be a Windows authenticated user. 如需 ASP.NET 和 Windows 驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。For more information on ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例以程式設計方式檢查目前登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視的應用程式角色資訊。The following code example programmatically checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles information for the application. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/CS/ViewRoles2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/VB/ViewRoles2vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫類別和方法屬性來判斷使用者是否存在於 Windows 群組。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is in a Windows group. 您可以呼叫只針對目前登入的使用者，以識別 LOGON_USER 伺服器變數的方法。You can call the method only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 目前的登入的使用者必須是 Windows 驗證的使用者。The current logged-on user must be a Windows authenticated user. 如需 ASP.NET 和 Windows 驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。For more information on ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例以程式設計方式檢查目前登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視的應用程式角色資訊。The following code example programmatically checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles information for the application. 如需可讓您管理角色的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see .
